messages.content: Now we are located in London, Moscow, Barcelona and Riga
We are company who is working with many different brands in clothing industry, carsharing, taxi services, different goods for parents, sport equipment, different apps, and many many more.
How big is ur agency and what brands?

Hey there,

My name is Alyona and I am the blogger relationship manager at V3 Agency. We are currently on the lookout for some super blogging talent to work with brands in our portfolio.

I would really love to explain a little bit about how we work, and most importantly, how you get paid. We work on the CPA (Cost per Acquisition) principle, effectively this means that you get paid when readers take an action on advertisers website, apps or store.

Why work with V3 Agency?

We work with bloggers of all sizes, regardless of the number of subscribers
We work with the best brands around the world.
We provide regular payments.
An individual manager is attached to each blogger, always on hand to solve any issues.

If you are interested in working with V3 Agency we will be happy to discuss the details of our cooperation via phone or email.
